name: 本杰明·阿比奥拉
name_full: 本杰明·阿比奥拉 Benjamin Abiola
introduction: Benjamin Abiola is a multi-hyphenate Creator, first generation British-Nigerian, who successfully infiltrated the United States to hold your laughter for ransom. An improv enthusiast who loves to create new characters and make them larger than life. His comedic charm and wit may woo you, but stay woke, everything isn't a joke! Ben is also a serious filmmaker who's created a number of successful films and series in the indie space under his production company, Don't Wait Create.Ben prides himself as an accomplished motion capture/voice actor, based in Los Angeles. His journey began back in 2016 when he moved from Arlington, Tx to North Hollywood, Ca.
